comment: He is very great professor.

Very easy class

Very accessible professor

Cares about students and their grades

He is objectively the best English professor at KSU. I took him for both ENG1101 and ENG1102. You're literally missing out if you don't take this professor. So easy to talk to, offers LOTS of extra credit, will extend due dates no matter what if you need him to. I'm so sad to leave his class for the second time.

Easily my best professor in my time at KSU. Super reasonable with his assignments, absolutely works with you on deadlines, just talk to him and I promise you'll get it figured out. Typically, a good bit of group work, but he'll listen to you if other group members are problematic and not be harsh on you. Take him any chance you can!
A glorious professor!
He is super caring and understanding. The only thing I struggled with in the class was online group work. Other than that it was a breeze.

Having him as my first English professor in college was amazing. If you have the chance to take him, you totally should. He gives so much extra credit, practically no late penalty, and he's super funny. The class was SUPER easy, but not in an unfun way. Overall, he's a super inspiring teacher who cares about every single one of his students.

The best teacher ever. Lots of extra credit opportunities. Very funny. One essay. Group projects. Very easy quizzes. Very understandable when it comes to not being able to make it to class due to a circumstance. No lockdown on the quizzes. No tests and the final is a project.100000% would take him again.

Professor Carter is easily the best professor I've had at KSU. He puts the needs of the students before anything and cares about each and every student. ENGL2110 contains a lot of reading and a quiz each class, but nothing too harsh. I can't recommend taking Professor Carter enough!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: he is one of the best teachers ive ever had. he is very understanding and open to grading and reopening missing assignments. he is very fun and enjoyable to be around. i would take him for every class if i could. you do group work every class butit is very easy to complete. there are quizzes every class as well,but very easy to get a 100.

Only take if you like group work. You do group work every single class. You do not pick your group. Gives various test options (poster, essay, etc). So many easy grades. Every grade is replaceable. Lots of extra credit. Gives extensions when needed. Class is a dream.

assigns groups at start of semester, youll work with them on class assignments. not too hard if you do the reading. very lenient about late work if you tell him. genuinely the nicest and most caring prof ive ever had, he really cares about you and wants you to pass. really funny guy too. projects are fun we brought food for extra credit on last day

assigns groups at the beginning of the semester, youll do all class assignments with them. not too bad as long as you do the readings. he is genuinely the nicest and most caring prof I have every had. He is very lenient about late assignments as long as you tell him. he really cares about you and wants you to get a good grade. very funny guy too.

Professor Carter is an amazing man! He tries to make sure everyone feels seen and understood. He takes time to actually learn your name, and also things about you. He is very understanding and helpful. You can come to him at anytime he is very welcoming and tries his best to make sure you enjoy his course. I would really recommend Professor Carter!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: Prof Carter is an amazing teacher! He goes out of his way to show that he cares for his students. He's forgiving with due dates when it comes to personal situations. He even makes the class intriguing overall. 10/10 Recommend taking his class!

This class was extremely easy. You work in groups and are graded on completion of your assignments. The exams do require some substantial thought, but just support your answers with evidence and you'll be fine. He was very flexible w/ grading and when things were due. He was totally understanding if assignments were late.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Dr. Carter gives his students options on how they would like the course to be such as exams, presentations, or essays. He was incredibly caring and would extend due dates to accommodate everyone. He also gave extra credit and they were very generous. World lit course had a lot of readings, but group work takes off weight with assignments.

The kindest professor I have ever had. He understands students go through a lot and he is willing to work with you especially since its group work mainly he is very fair on grading if you do your part. He is the best EVER. Please take HIM.
Took him for the online 8 week course (3/13-5/01). Easily one of the best teachers I've had at KSU. Cares about your grade and gives you extra time to complete assignments.
Best professor I've taken. Genuinely cares for students and their grades. Topics and reading were interesting and not a drag. Learned to write better because of him --can't recommend him enough.
Professor Carter is the best! Have a glorious day!

Such a caring and flexible professor. He is very genuine and cares about you and your grades. His material is unique and easy if you do the assignments. I looked forward to his class but he is big on group work. Great professor!!

AMAZING!! I want to take his class again. he is very understanding, funny, and easy-going. class is not mandatory but you will miss quizzes that cannot be taken again. there were group projects but nothing too heavy. no final, two essays, one group project, small discussion posts.

Amazing professor. He cares about his students, is genuinely funny, and offers a crazy amount of extra credit. As long as you do the readings and show up for the quizzes this should be an easy A. Very forgiving on grading and is the most approachable professor I've ever had.

Mr.s Carter wants you to be able to take something away from this class. Very personable, loves to talk, he takes time to get to know and talk to each student. Attendance is not required but it is strongly recommended to be successful.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: I was an SI for Professor carter and e was amazing. He gives tons of extra credit that are super easy and even going to university events and the writing center alone can get you an A in the class

Prof. Carter is amazing! Easily one of the best professors I've had. He genuinely cares about the well-being of his students and is open about extensions on assignments. There are plenty extra credit options, and the assignments are fairly easy. He's a great professor and I would recommend him to anyone.
Amazing professor that actually cares about his students success!! I loved coming to his classes he is a very amazing guy!! Would definitely take him again !

Prof Carter is by far one of the best teachers I have EVER had. He genuinely cares about his students and will do anything in his power to help you! He extended due dates based on the class's needs and actually paid attention to how we were feeling about his class. I also plan on taking him again for World Lit because he is amazing!

Professor Carter is as good as it gets for any English professor. He is extremely caring of ALL of his students and wants every student to succeed. He understands that life sometimes gets hard and busy, so if you are late on an assignment just talk to him. No reason you should fail this class.

Professor Carter is the best professor hands down! He genuinely cares about his students and is always willing to work with you! I recommend his classes to everyone i know. He is the best! He gives many opportunities for extra credit and makes you want to come to class! He is always there to help you in or out of class :)

Love Professor Carter such an amazing person would recommend taking this class if you need to take ENGL 1101! He really cares about his students and is very understanding if you talk to him. Always responds to emails if you have any questions he will help you out! You can easily get an A if you do all the work which is really easy to finish.

I have only great things to say about Professor Carter! I actually enjoyed having to roll out of bed and go to his class. He is not just knowledgeable and passionate about what he teaches but also builds great connections with his students. Great energy and all-around a great guy! His class was, as he always says, "glorious"!

Professor Carter genuinely cares about his students inside and out of the classroom. He loves to hear about your day and will let you rant to him. His class is relatively easy, as long as you stay on top of the reading and pay attention to the rubric. He gives multiple opportunities for extra credit. 100000000% take him!!

Take this class! He is an amazing professor. Truly cares about you, especially your mental health. Need an extension on something? You got it. He will ask you how long you need. Very understanding/caring. But, there are readings. You will need to read but it's not bad at all. Easy A. Provides a lot of extra credit opportunities.

Professor Carter is the BEST PROFESSOR EVER. He is very understanding about mental health and is very easy to talk to. I 10000% recommend this professor. There are a few group assignments but it's nothing major. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR.

He is AWESOME. He's super understanding of our mental health so he's flexible when you need help with an assignment. A normal amount of reading was there, but it was really manageable. Tons of extra credit opportunities and easy to follow rubrics. Please take him if you want to have a good connection with a professor. There's some group worth tho.

Literally one of the best professors I've ever had. SUPER flexible with due dates and deadlines, and every lecture was a lot of fun. Has a wonderful personality and is always willing to help. Everything in his class built up to a research paper around 15 pages, but since every assignment was building up to it, it was really easy.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Carter is a very caring and enthusiastic person. He wants to see his students succeed and will always give individuals extra time to get work done. I didnt care for the first half of the course because it was very reading and politically heavy. Everything you have to do in that class is constantly reminded and made clear.

Professor Carter is my favorite professor I have taken. He really cares about his students, and he will always be able to help. There is one essay that is broken down throughout the course. He wants all of his students to pass the class and will do all he can to help.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: HE WILL GIVE YOU EXTENSIONS BC HE WANTS YOU TO SUCCEED

Not enough good things to say. Easy A for sure no matter what your writing level is. Many extra credit opportunities. Easy final. Hes absolutely hilarious. Missed class once? dont worry about it, hes easy to reach and very understanding. This is a professor you think about later on and it just makes you smile. Awesome class, 100% recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Carter's class was by far my favorite class this semester. Professor Carter truly cares about his students. His assignments are focused to prepare you for the research paper at the end of the year. He is kind and understanding, so don't feel hesitant to reach out to him!

professor carter isn't a bad teacher, however can be difficult to work with. his grading is odd, and i had quite a few conflicts with him about grades on papers. he would frequently give me "1"s on rubrics even though the necessary parts were there. overall, not a bad class. he offers plenty of extra credit and is fun and interactive in class!

Professor Carter actually cares about you and does everything in his power to get you the grade that you want. He offers extra credit. It is a lot of work and one final research paper that has a lot of steps leading up to it. If you do the work, getting a good grade is very attainable.

Were no tests, but had a 15 Page research paper due at the end of the semester. Was not a difficult class if you did the work. Super nice, and wants his students to get an A. Gives out plenty of extra credit assignments, drops low grades, or 10 points added to research paper assignments. Take him if you can. Super fun in class, and interactive.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: If youre taking an English class and see Professor Carter , please take him! You wont regret it ! He really cares about his students success and he is so genuine . You earn what you put in but he is definitely a great professor !
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Carter is such a kind, caring person. He was so understanding about my situation throughout the semester. If you are looking for an educated professor who will actually help you through your coursework, he is perfect for you.

I loved him !! He responded to emails in a timely manner , he really cares about students and wants everyone to pass ! He picked some interesting topics to talk about. It was the only online class I had that felt like real class. I would recommend him to anyonee, dont hesitate to register for his class before all the spots get taken !

Professor Carter is by far my favorite English professor at KSU. He is extremely understanding and you can see he truly cares about his students. There is quite a bit of work but he facilitates the process as much as he can and he is willing to be flexible with his due dates.

One of the best profs I've ever had. He is a fair grader, and his assignments are challenging but not unreasonable. Useful research writing class for any career in science. He is friendly and funny, and he is very understanding/flexible with due dates. He gives lots of opportunities for one on one writing conferences too.
The nicest Professor the work can be difficult, but he gives extensions and helps his students.

this is the only english course i have taken at ksu. professor carter is very kind, approachable, and understanding. instead of writing multiple papers, you write 1 (15-20 pgs). you write a research proposal and a literature review that will help build your essay, and you will have smaller assignments to help boost your grade. the best professor!!

For the first time in my life, I actually got an A in Literature. He is willing to help you by any (ethical) means, outside of class he will help explain your assignments and give critique before submission. The research paper is your final and is a bit long, but he expects you to have learned how to do it through the assigned books and lectures.
Professor Carter genuinely cares for his students, and he is very clear with his communication. He gives lots of opportunities to succeed, too!

Lots of small reading quizzes at the beginning of class, but you can go to the writing center and he will replace those bad grades. Long research paper due at the end of class, lots of assignments due first though to make grading it less harsh and writing the paper easier. Really nice, lectures are interesting and discussion based
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Hilarious

comment: You will definitely love Carter. He is such an amazing guy and professor. He is caring, understanding, not to mention hilarious, and you will become a better writer at the end of his class. There are quite a lot of papers, but they all lead toward the final Research Paper. It wont be an easy A, but he will do everything in his power to help you.

Prof. Carter's class is certainly challenging, if you really want to learn, this is the class for you. He grades very fairly and is one of the most hilarious, understanding, and caring professors I've met. He respects his students just as much as they respect him and makes 100% sure you understand what to do and what he expects. Great prof & class

Professor Carter is so nice, funny, and caring. He gives clear instructions and is very willing to help his students in or outside of class. He gives so many extra credit opportunities, and truly wants the best for his students. He makes the class get into groups and work together a lot, which makes it fun. I would recommend!
The best professor I have had! He cares for his students and our education. The class is easy as long as you do all the assignments and reading but he also does offer a lot of extra credit.

Hands down one of the best professors at KSU. He really cares about every students and goes out of his way to create personal relationships with each one. His class is structured very well and if you read the required books, poems etc. then it can be an easy A. 10/10 would recommend !!!!

Carter's enthusiasm for literature studies is contagious, where he had me excited about discussing our readings. If you are nervous about group activities, reading, or writing, I highly recommend this course because it will help you develop these skills! Carter cares about his students and provides ample extra credit so that you can succeed.

He is a really hard essay grader!! He loves class discussions on books we are reading. I liked his class but I really had to do a lot of work and extra credit to bring up my grade. If you talk to him, he will help you. Go to the writing center!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Professor Carter is great he really cares about your grade and he wants you to pass, you get 100 on all classwork and quizzes if you go to the writing center

Mr. Carter is an incredibly genuine and kind-hearted person. His sense of humor is great, and it always makes his class a fun place to be. While he has a specific way he likes papers to be written, he provides great feedback on how to achieve the best grade possible. I HIGHLY recommend taking Mr. Carter whenever you can!
Great Teacher!!!! My favorite teacher in college so far

Professor Carter is a great professor! He grades based off of a rubric provided online, doesn't give a lot of homework and always has the most optimistic energy in class. He gives great feedback and there are many ways in which he gives you the opportunity to discuss your work with him. I'd definitely recommend him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria
